Scripts.OnClick: self.sortIndex[self.sortType] = not self.sortIndex[self.sortType] GuildRoster_SortByColumn(self.sortType, self.sortIndex) PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn")

Scripts.OnEnter: if self.tooltip then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.tooltip) GameTooltip:Show() end
